forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air is cool, brushed by a gentle south-southwest breeze that carries the promise of a brighter day. While the night brought a shroud of partially cloudy skies, remnants of fog loom closer to the horizon, softening the edges of the cityscape and hinting at the possibility of a marine layer lingering above the bay. A low of 51 degrees lingers in the memory of the early risers, but the day ahead warms to a comfortable high of around 63. As the sun ascends, its golden rays will pierce through, illuminating the city and gradually lifting the veils of mist.

The day beckons all to embrace a variety of gentle pursuits. A stroll along the Embarcadero could be invigorated by the cheerful weather, where the glint of sunlight dances on the surface of the bay. For those with a penchant for solitude, the quietude of a neighborhood café, adorned with sunbeams, offers a perfect nook for reflection or conversation. Dress in layers to accommodate the playful oscillation between cool morning air and later warmth, perhaps opting for a light cardigan over a T-shirt, as you venture out to enjoy the vibrant pulse of the city. With this splendid weather in store, there's no better time to savor both the urban charm and natural beauty that San Francisco so effortlessly provides.
